/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The trees, stripped of their leaves, stand bare against the winter sky, their branches reaching out like skeletal fingers. The sun shines through these branches, casting a warm glow that contrasts with the cool blue of the sky. The road itself is devoid of any traffic, adding to the tranquility of the scene. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their muted colors blending harmoniously with the natural surroundings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and gives a sense of depth to the scene.
